text: (Uthumele) uMthunywa (uMuhammad), enicengcelezela iiVesi ezicacileyo zika-Allâh hon’ukuze ngazo Akhuphe ebumnyameni abo bakholwayo benza izenzo ezilungileyo Yena Uya kubangenisa eMiyezweni ekumpompoza imilambo ngaphantsi kwayo, bahlale apho ngonaphakade. UAllâh Uya kumlungiselela (uMuhammad nabakholwayo) imbonelelo (entle)
